

[++Misc++]

[Coins Max(Press Y)]
DD000000 00000800
104A2810 0000FFFF
{Press Y. Close and reopen suitcase}

[--]

[++Battle codes++]

[Exp in Battle (R+Down/R+UP)]
DD000000 00000180
D3000000 31000000
000A12B8 000003E7
D2000000 00000000
DD000000 00000140
D3000000 31000000
000A18E8 000003E7
D2000000 00000000
{R+down for Mario
R+Up for Luigi}

[Exp in Battle (Both)]
DD000000 00000100
D3000000 31000000
000A12B8 000003E7
000A18E8 000003E7
D2000000 00000000
{Press R}

[Shields(L+Up)]
DD000000 00000240
D3000000 31000000
000A11E0 00000063
D3000000 31000000
000A1810 00000063
D2000000 00000000

[--]

DD000000 00000840
C0000000 00000013
004A2814 00000063

{Press Y and UP}

{Press Y then Down}
